fields.name: Learn a player's attack power, +/- (120 - your score / 100), rounded to the nearest tenth. For example:
fields.value:
If you scored 100, and your target's attack power is 1.1x, you will receive a result +/- 0.2; so 0.9x to 1.3x.

***Abuse Evidence** (1x, Locked)*
Unlocked when you place in the top 3. You may attack a player with the attack power discovered by your last use of Examine Evidence.

***Personal Vendetta** (1x, Locked)*
Unlocked if you are attacked but survive. You may use Examine Evidence during the evening phase.

***Gunpowder Residue** (Passive)*
If your use of Examine Evidence returned a value of 1.0x or higher, any Investigative actions targeting you will be incorrect the next night.
